title: New BLUFFS attack lets attackers hijack Bluetooth connections
description: Researchers at Eurecom have developed six new attacks collectively named 'BLUFFS' that can break the secrecy of Bluetooth sessions, allowing for device impersonation and man-in-the-middle (MitM) attacks. [...]

title: Google Chrome emergency update fixes 5th zero-day exploited in 2023
description: Google has fixed the fifth Chrome zero-day vulnerability this year in an emergency security update released today to counter ongoing exploitation in attacks. [...]

title: Google Chrome emergency update fixes 6th zero-day exploited in 2023
description: Google has fixed the sixth Chrome zero-day vulnerability this year in an emergency security update released today to counter ongoing exploitation in attacks. [...]

title: Qilin ransomware claims attack on automotive giant Yanfeng
description: The Qilin ransomware group has claimed responsibility for a cyber attack on Yanfeng Automotive Interiors (Yanfeng), one of the world's largest automotive parts suppliers. [...]

title: Microsoft shares temp fix for Outlook crashes when sending emails
description: Today, Microsoft shared a temporary fix for a known issue causing Outlook Desktop to crash when sending emails from Outlook.com accounts. [...]

title: DP World confirms data stolen in cyberattack, no ransomware used
description: International logistics giant DP World has confirmed that data was stolen during a cyber attack that disrupted its operations in Australia earlier this month. However, no ransomware payloads or encryption was used in the attack. [...]

title: Hackers start exploiting critical ownCloud flaw, patch now
description: Hackers are exploiting a critical ownCloud vulnerability tracked as CVE-2023-49103 that exposes admin passwords, mail server credentials, and license keys in containerized deployments. [...]

title: Police dismantle ransomware group behind attacks in 71 countries
description: In cooperation with Europol and Eurojust, law enforcement agencies from seven nations have arrested in Ukraine the core members of a ransomware group linked to attacks against organizations in 71 countries. [...]
